translations: （Dixit）人名；（印、尼、印尼、英）迪克西特；（法）迪克西

sentences.translation: Game of the Year 2010(迪克西特，10年度游戏奖)。

sentences.sentence: Dixit swept the European board game awards-which are like the Oscars but more cutthroat and less riddled with production Numbers.
sentences.translation: Dixit已经横扫了好几个欧洲的棋盘游戏奖——如oscars，不过没有那么泛滥，这游戏更残酷一些，而且人人都可参与。

sentences.sentence: N. Dixit believed that Nehru made a grievous error of judgment in ordering an all-out general offensive when it should have been selective, gradual and area-specific.
sentences.translation: 迪克西特认为，尼赫鲁对形势的判断发生严重的错误，当时他不该发起全国总攻，而应采取有选择的、渐进的，区域性的方式。
